ygData.subject: RE: Charm after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: You know... this is odd.  Did any of the bard related patches actually make it into the game!?!  I received no charm broken messages last night as well
ygData.messageBody:
You know... this is odd. Did any of the bard related patches actually make
it into the game!?! I received no "charm broken" messages last night as
well (although, I should point out that I only used charm 2 or 3 times
during heavy combat - it's possible that I missed it).

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 11:40 AM
> To: Eqbards@...
> Subject: [eqbards] Charm after patch
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
> I got a tell from Cleaver on Fennin Ro last night (Hi
> Cleaver!) about Charm.
> He was naturally enough curious as to whether I'd seen a
> message to the
> effect that "Your charm has broken!" as was billed in the
> patch text. I had
> not, and am sure disappointed about it. Has anyone found
> circumstances in
> which we do receive a "charm breaks" message? Otherwise I
> chalk it up to a
> bug or flat-out mistake, like as the "You have gotten better at
> Swimming(71/90)" type messages that we never got.
>
> Crier Sharpsong - 28th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
